weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I can make snowballs!
👚 You need to bundle up when I'm around.
⛄ I'm made of frozen water.

weather.question: I help plants grow and make puddles on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 I come from clouds.
💧 I am water falling from the sky.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants grow towards me.
🔥 I am a big ball of fire in the sky.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees and can blow your hat away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong.
🌬️ I can make windmills turn.
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can turn gray when I'm full of water.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌊 I can cause flooding.
🏡 People sometimes have to leave their homes when I come.

weather.question: I am a bright, colorful arc that appears after a rain shower. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ You can only see me when the sun is behind you.
🧪 I am made of light refracting through water droplets.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I am small and hard, like tiny balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
🧊 I can damage cars and plants.
🥶 I am different from snow even though I am icy.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that forms a spinning cloud that touches the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift cars and houses.
🌽 They are very common in tornado alley.
🌪️ People take shelter when I am around.

weather.question: I am very dry weather for a long time. Plants and animals struggle to survive. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ The ground cracks because it has no water.
🔥 I can lead to wildfires.
🌵 Farmers worry a lot when I happen.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I crawl on land and in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I'm a fish with very sharp teeth and people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
😬 I have pointy teeth.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have bones.
🎨 I can change color.
🖐️ I have many arms.

ocean.question: I am a big, friendly sea animal that makes clicking sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am a mammal.
🧠 I am very smart.
🔊 I use sound to talk.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small.
🌈 I have bright colors.
🧱 I live near coral.

ocean.question: I'm a very large mammal that lives in the ocean, sings songs, and has a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the biggest animal on Earth!
🎵 I communicate with melodies.
💨 I breathe through a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I live on the ocean floor, look like a plant, but I am an animal with stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I may look like a plant, but I'm not!
🚫 Don't touch me; I can sting!
🏠 Nemo loves to live in me!

ocean.question: I am a long, skinny fish that hides in the sand and can give you an electric shock. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can zap you!
🐍 I have a long, snake-like body.
🏖️ I like to bury myself.

ocean.question: I am a creature that lives in the deep sea and can glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have my own built in light.
🔦 I live far down where it's very dark.
👹 Some of us have scary faces.
